com.github.katjahahn.coffheader

Class COFFFileHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.katjahahn.PEModule
      • com.github.katjahahn.coffheader.COFFFileHeader

  • public class COFFFileHeader
extends PEModule
    Reads the COFF File Header and allows access to the information in it.
